attributes.action: Scrap the Infrastructure Act 2015, which facilitates public land to be grabbed.
attributes.additional_details:
The Infrastructure Act will supercede all protection of land and all local council rights - including the Forestry Act and the Rights of Way Act. There will be absolutely nothing standing between your local beauty spot and private development. Except EU protection - which is rarely invoked.

For more details:

http://www.thecanary.co/2016/03/25/16830/
attributes.background: The Infrastructure Act will overturn ALL protection and local authority rights to defend publicly owned land from private interests - such as industry, business and residential developments. In a nutshell - your local park could be bought and turned into, for example, a nuclear power station.

rejection.details: We think the following petition is similar to yours: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/125804
